effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
